name: Web Builder Pro
description: A powerful web building tool with drag-and-drop functionality. It offers customizable templates, SEO optimization, and e-commerce integration.

name: EasySiteBuilder
description: Create stunning websites with ease using EasySiteBuilder. It provides pre-designed templates, mobile-friendly design, and social media integration.

name: QuickBuild
description: Build websites quickly and efficiently with QuickBuild. It features an intuitive editor, built-in analytics, and e-commerce support for SEO-friendly URLs.

name: SiteMaster
description: SiteMaster is an all-in-one website building solution for professionals. It offers an advanced drag-and-drop editor, customizable themes, and integrated blogging platform.
